about_the_game:
Explore Encore Peak in this expansion DLC!
This peak use to be an enclave where many monsters would hide.
Their territorial dispute becoming more intense, the area was sealed
and no Tiki was allowed to venture out there.
The seal now appear to have been lifted and Tikis can now set on a
new adventure!

DLC CONTENTS
  • New Area : Encore Peak (3 stages)
  • New Tower : Missile
  • New Masks (4 motifs)
  • New Shells (4 motifs)

name: PixelJunk™ Monsters 2 Encore Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: i3-3000 series or better Dual Core CPU. i5 or better recommended.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 or better.
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Explore Encore Peak in this expansion DLC! This peak use to be an enclave where many monsters would hide. Their territorial dispute becoming more intense, the area was sealed and no Tiki was allowed to venture out there. The seal now appear to have been lifted and Tikis can now set on a new adventure!
supported_languages: English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
